modName: Kiir  Do Se Bormahu child of Akatosh
summary: Race mod bases on the Nord race Play as half Dragon half Nord
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=4]ANY AND ALL screenshots ARE WELCOME AND APPRECIATED[/size][/color]

[color=#ff00ff][size=6]To Fix CTD completely uninstall and delete all files included in this mod the download and install new version v2.0 OR HIGHER[/size][/color]

[/font][/b][b][font=Comic Sans MS]Back in the Merethic Era when Akatosh first bestowed the Gift of Dragon Blood onto mortals creating the Dohvakiin said to be uniquely gifted in the way of the voice the Kiir  Do, Se Bormahu (children of Akatosh) help Mortals defeat their Dragon Overlords and Vanished But now the dragons are Back and Mudus and This Ancient race has returned



[/font][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][u][color=#ff0000]STARTING STATS FOR BASE NORDS FOR COMPARISON [/color]
[color=#00ff00]HEALTH 50[/color]
[color=#00ff00]MAGICKA 50[/color]
[color=#00ff00]STAMINA 50[/color]
[color=#00ff00]CARRY WEIGHT 300[/color]
[color=#00ff00]HEALTH REGEN 0.7[/color]
[color=#00ff00]MAGICKA REGEN 3.0[/color][/u][/font][/size][/b][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][u]
[color=#00ff00]STAMINA REGEN 5.0[/color][/u][/font][/size][/b][b][size=4]

Stealthy esp w[/font][/u][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=5][u][font=Comic Sans MS]it[/font][/u][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=5][u][font=Comic Sans MS]h altered stats you sneaky assassins out there[/font][/u][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ffff00]

UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT  MIGHT WORK WITHOUT BUT ITS THE BODY MOD I USE SO ALL THE SFW MESHES COME FROM THIS
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?[/size][/color]

[size=5][color=#ff0000]INSTALL[/color]
[/size]Download using NMM MO or just copy the textures folder, meshes and scripts folder and Child Of Akatosh Esp into your Data Folder

[color=#ff0000][size=4]UPDATING OR CHANGING VERSION[/size][/color]
uninstall all files in this mod the then down load and install new version

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Optional ESP[/size][/color]
Download and click yes to all when asked if you want to over-wright

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Change Log
[/size][/color]Added new Daily Power
Added new Lesser Power to summon A Custom Purple Flame Atronarch
Added New Passive Power
Included [b][font=Comic Sans MS]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE  Skeletons [color=#ff0000]WILL STILL NEED ORIGINAL IF YOU WANT TO EDIT ITEM PLACEMENT ON BODY [/color][/font][/b][/font][/b][/u][u][b][font=Comic Sans MS]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]MASSIVE THANKS TO[/size][/color] ZwabberdieBo For letting me use His Amazing Born A Dragon Textures 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63680/?[/font][/b][/u]
